amendment.description: To set aside funding in connection with the harbor of Morehead City, North Carolina, for a project to disperse sand along Bogue Banks.

vote.text: Amendment SA 1689 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 1689 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Dole. (consideration: CR S11539; text: CR S11539) To set aside funding in connection with the harbor of Morehead City, North Carolina, for a project to disperse sand along Bogue Banks.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 1689 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 1689 proposed by Senator Domenici for Senator Dole.
